forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day greets you with a gentle embrace of mostly sunny skies, hinting at a serene morning that will evolve into the familiar coolness of the afternoon. The high today hovers near sixty-four, a mild invitation to enjoy the city's vibrant scenes, while the west-southwest winds whistle playfully at speeds that will occasionally reach gusts of thirty-two miles per hour. With temperatures gracefully descending to around sixty-two in the latter part of the day, the edges of this urban landscape will remain crisp, a reminder of the Pacific’s influence.

As evening approaches, expect a shift to mostly cloudy skies, the clouds knitting a cozy cover overhead, bringing the temperature down to a pleasant fifty-four. Although some fog may linger, veiling parts of the city briefly during the early hours, its presence is too ephemeral to dampen spirits. On such a day, layering is wise; a light jacket or sweater would serve well against the brisk winds, while comfortable footwear beckons for explorations through open plazas or along the waterfront. Perhaps today is perfect for an unhurried walk through one of the lesser-known parks, or a visit to a local café sipping something warm, allowing the world to pass by in a soft blur. There’s beauty in the mundane today, and the city waits to unveil its charms to those who venture forth.
